ac.name: Armor Class
ac.description: Determines the value your opponents must roll on an attack in order to hit you.

ac_flatfoot.name: Armor Class (Caught Flatfooted)
ac_flatfoot.description: Determines the value your opponents must roll on an attack in order to hit you whan you are caught flatfooted. Armor class without dexterity bonus

ac_touch.name: Armor Class (vs Touch)
ac_touch.description: Determines the value your opponents must roll on an attack in order to hit you with a touch attack. Armor class without modifiers from equipment

armor_penalty.name: Equipment Internal (penalty to some skills from equipment)

cha.name: Charisma
cha.description: Charisma measures a character’s personality, personal magnetism, ability to lead, and appearance.

con.name: Constitution
con.description: Constitution represents your character’s health and stamina. A Constitution bonus increases a character’s hit points, so the ability is important for all classes.

dex.name: Dexterity
dex.description: Dexterity measures agility, reflexes, and balance. This ability is useful for characters who wear light or medium armor or no armor at all. This ability is vital for characters seeking to excel with ranged weapons.

fly_modifier.name: fly_modifier
fly_modifier.description: internal size modifier value for the flying skill

hit.name: Equipment Internal (Basic hit bonus - all types)

hp.name: Hit Points
hp.description: Overall health of character. Start dying when this reaches 0

initiative.name: Initiative Bonus
initiative.description: Added to a d20 dice roll when rolling for battle initiative. Determines turn order.

int.name: Intelligence
int.description: Intelligence determines how well your character learns and reasons.

maneuverability_modifier.name: maneuverability_modifier
maneuverability_modifier.description: internal maneuverability modifier for the flying skill

save_fort.name: Fortitude Saving Throw
save_fort.description: Roll this when attempting to resist bodily effects such as poison or bleeding.

save_ref.name: Reflex Saving Throw
save_ref.description: Roll this when attempting to avoid getting hit (such as dodging out of the way of an attack)

save_will.name: Will Saving Throw
save_will.description: Roll this when attempting to resist metal effects such as mind control or illusions.

str.name: Strength
str.description: Strength measures muscle and physical power. This ability is important for those who engage in hand-to-hand (or “melee”) combat. Strength also sets the maximum amount of weight your character can carry.

wis.name: Wisdom
wis.description: Wisdom describes a character’s willpower, common sense, awareness, and intuition.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: You can keep your balance while traversing narrow or treacherous surfaces. You can also dive, flip, junp, and roll, avoiding attacks and confusing your opponents

appraise.name: Appraise
appraise.description: You can evaluate the monetary value of an object

bluff.name: Bluff
bluff.description: You know how to tell a lie.

climb.name: Climb
climb.description: You are skilled at scaling vertical surfaces, from smooth city walls to rocky cliffs.

craft.name: Craft (Template)
craft.description: You are skilled in the creation of a specific group of items, such as armor or weapons. You can have many different craft skills, with different types and ranks.

diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: You can use this skill to persuade others to agree with your arguments, to resolve differences, and to gather valuable information or rumors from people. This skill is also used to negotiate conflicts by using the proper etiquette and manners suitable to the problem.

disable_device.name: Disable Device
disable_device.description: You are skilled at disarming traps and opening locks. In addition, this skill lets you sabotage simple mechanical devices, such as catapults, wagon wheels, and doors.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: You are skilled at changing your appearance. This could effect things such as physical appearance, mannerisms, or even voice.

escape_artist.name: Escape Artist
escape_artist.description: Your training allows you to slip bonds and escape from grapples.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description:
You are skilled at flying, either through the use of wings or magic, and you can perform daring or complex maneuvers while airborne. Note that this skill does not give you the ability to fly.

You cannot take this skill without a natural means of flight or gliding. Creatures can also take ranks in Fly if they possess a reliable means of flying every day (either through a spell or other magical manner, such as a druid’s wild shape ability).

handle_animal.name: Handle Animal
handle_animal.description: You are trained at working with animals, and can teach them tricks, get them to follow your simple commands, or even domesticate them.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: You are skilled at tending to the ailments of others. This is typically used for first-aid activities, such as stopping bleeding or curing poison.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: You can use this skill to frighten your opponents or to get them to act in a way that benefits you. This skill includes verbal threats and displays of prowess.

knowledge.name: Knowledge (Template)
knowledge.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Knowledge actually encompasses a number of different specialties, each with their own rank and skill levels

knowledge_arcana.name: Knowledge (Arcana)
knowledge_arcana.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Arcana encompasses ancient mysteries, magic traditions, arcane symbols, magical constructs (not robots), magical beasts, and similar.

knowledge_dungeoneering.name: Knowledge (Dungeoneering)
knowledge_dungeoneering.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Dungeoneering encompasses aberrations, caverns, oozes, and anything related to spelunking.

knowledge_engineering.name: Knowledge (Engineering)
knowledge_engineering.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Engineering encompasses buildings, fortifications, robots, and similar technology-related subjects.

knowledge_geography.name: Knowledge (Geography)
knowledge_geography.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Geography encompasses climate, terrain, astronomy, lands and peoples, and similar topographical subjects.

knowledge_history.name: Knowledge (History)
knowledge_history.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. History encompasses wars, colonies, migrations,  the founding of cities, and similar topics.

knowledge_local.name: Knowledge (Local)
knowledge_local.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Local knowledge encompasses legends, personalities, inhabitants, laws, customs, traditions, and similar topics of gossip.

knowledge_nature.name: Knowledge (Nature)
knowledge_nature.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Nature encompasses animals, fey, monstrous humanoids, seasons, the weather, and similar topics.

knowledge_nobility.name: Knowledge (Nobility)
knowledge_nobility.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Nobility encompasses lineages, heraldry, royalty, famous personalities, and similar topics.

knowledge_planes.name: Knowledge (Planes)
knowledge_planes.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Planar knowledge encompasses the relationships between the various planes of existance to the Matarial plane, we well as creatures or magic that originate from other planes.

knowledge_religion.name: Knowledge (Religion)
knowledge_religion.description: You are educated in a field of study and can answer both simple and complex questions. Religion encompasses gods and goddesses, mythic history, ecclesiastic tradition, holy symbols, and the undead.

linguistics.name: Linguistics
linguistics.description:
You are skilled at working with language, in both its spoken and written forms. You can speak multiple languages, and can decipher nearly any tongue given enough time. Your skill in writing allows you to create and detect forgeries as well.

Every rank put into this skill allows you to select another language that your character knows.

perception.name: Perception
perception.description: Your senses allow you to notice fine details and alert you to danger. Perception covers all five senses, including sight, hearing, touch, taste, and smell.

perform.name: Perform (Template)
perform.description: You are skilled at one form of entertainment, from singing to acting to playing an instrument. You could have several Perform skills, each with its own ranks.

profession.name: Profession (Template)
profession.description:
A Profession skill represents an aptitude in a vocation requiring a broader range of less specific knowledge. Some examples are: architect, baker, farmer, gambler, merchant, and scribe. 

You could have several Profession skills, each with its own ranks.

ride.name: Ride
ride.description: You are skilled at riding mounts, usually a horse, but possibly something more exotic, like a griffon or pegasus. If you attempt to ride a creature that is ill suited as a mount, you take a –5 penalty on your Ride checks.

sense_motive.name: Sense Motive
sense_motive.description: You are skilled at detecting falsehoods and true intentions.

sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight_of_hand.description: Your training allows you to pick pockets, draw hidden weapons, and take a variety of actions without being noticed.

spellcraft.name: Spellcraft
spellcraft.description: You are skilled at the art of casting spells, identifying magic items, crafting magic items, and identifying spells as they are being cast.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: You are skilled at avoiding detection, allowing you to slip past foes or strike from an unseen position. This skill covers hiding and moving silently.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: You are skilled at surviving in the wild and at navigating in the wilderness. You also excel at following trails and tracks left by others.

swim.name: Swim
swim.description: You know how to swim and can do so even in stormy water.

use_magic_device.name: Use Magic Device
use_magic_device.description: You are skilled at activating magic items, even if you are not otherwise trained in their use.

move.name: Walk
move.description: Movement Action. Move your character up to your standard movement speed.

punch.name: Brawl
punch.description:
Basic unarmed punch, kick, headbutt, or similar.
Deals non-lethal damage.

run.name: Hustle
run.description: Movement + Standard Action. Move your character up to double your movement speed.

sprint.name: Run
sprint.description: Full-round action. Move your character up to 4x your movement speed (3x in heavy armor).

step.name: Step
step.description: Free action. Adjust your character location by one 5-foot space. Cannot be combined with other movement actions.

throw_item.name: Throw Item
throw_item.description: Basic ranged attack. This could be throwing something such

use_skill.name: Use Skill
use_skill.description: Swift action. Perform a skill check to interact with your surroundings.

ability_point.name: Bonus Ability Point
ability_point.description: Add 1 to any ability point of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Charisma, Wisdom, or Intelligence).

ability_point.name: Bonus Ability Point
ability_point.description: Add 1 to any ability point of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Charisma, Wisdom, or Intelligence).

ability_point.name: Bonus Ability Point
ability_point.description: Add 1 to any ability point of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Charisma, Wisdom, or Intelligence).

ability_point.name: Bonus Ability Point
ability_point.description: Add 1 to any ability point of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Charisma, Wisdom, or Intelligence).

ability_point.name: Bonus Ability Point
ability_point.description: Add 1 to any ability point of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Charisma, Wisdom, or Intelligence).

bonus_feat.name: Bonus Feat
bonus_feat.description: Please add one feat to your character. This can be any type as long as the requirements for the feat are met for your character.
